word:
Since we have had our most excellent meetings in Cooranbong since July 1, during which time I spoke to the people under the inspiration of the 


                                    -149- 

Spirit of God, Brother Rousseau [has] acknowledged to me that he was now perfectly satisfied for himself in his own [that] this is the place God designed the school should be established. There are advantages here that we could not have in any other location they had visited. The land they had thought so bad was found on working it, not to be the best land, but average.
